languages.text: {n}По горящим глазам собравшихся ясно — ваши слова и сама встреча с Вольным Торговцем во плоти впечатлили их.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}По горящим глазам детей ясно — ваши слова и сама встреча с Вольным Торговцем во плоти впечатлили их.{/n}

languages.text: {n}You can tell by their bright eyes that your words and the very fact of meeting the Rogue Trader in the flesh have left an indelible impression on them.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}По горящим глазам собравшихся ясно — ваши слова и сама встреча с Вольным Торговцем во плоти впечатлили их.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}You can tell by the children's bright eyes that your words and the very fact of meeting the Rogue Trader in the flesh have left an impression on them.{/n}
{n}You can tell by the children's bright eyes that your words and the very fact of meeting the Rogue Trader in the flesh have left an impression on them.{/n}
{n}You can tell by their bright eyes that your words and the very fact of meeting the Rogue Trader in the flesh have left an indelible impression on them.{/n}

{n}You can tell by their bright eyes that your words and the very fact of meeting the Rogue Trader in the flesh have left an indelible impression on them.{/n}

languages.text: {n}从孩子们明亮的眼神中可以看出，行商浪人亲自出现在他们面前，还对他们亲口说了这些话，这给他们留下了不可磨灭的印象。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You can tell by their bright eyes that your words and the very fact of meeting the Rogue Trader in the flesh have left an indelible impression on them.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}从孩子们明亮的眼神中可以看出，行商浪人亲自出现在他们面前，还对他们亲口说了这些话，这给他们留下了不可磨灭的印象。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Por el brillo de sus ojos, está claro que tus palabras y el haber conocido a un{mf||a} Comerciante Independiente les ha causado una impresión indeleble.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You can tell by their bright eyes that your words and the very fact of meeting the Rogue Trader in the flesh have left an indelible impression on them.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Por el brillo de los ojos de los niños, está claro que tus palabras y el haber conocido a un{mf||a} Comerciante Independiente les ha causado una impresión indeleble.{/n}

languages.text: {n}彼らの明るい目を見れば、あなたの言葉や、自由開拓者に実際に会えたという事実が、忘れるられない印象を残したことがわかった。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You can tell by their bright eyes that your words and the very fact of meeting the Rogue Trader in the flesh have left an indelible impression on them.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}彼らの明るい目を見れば、あなたの言葉や、自由開拓者に実際に会えたという事実が、忘れるられない印象を残したことがわかった。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Du kannst an den strahlenden Augen der Jugendlichen erkennen, dass deine Worte und der Umstand, {mf|den Freihändler|die Freihändlerin} persönlich getroffen zu haben, einen tiefen Eindruck bei ihnen hinterlassen haben.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You can tell by their bright eyes that your words and the very fact of meeting the Rogue Trader in the flesh have left an indelible impression on them.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Du kannst an den strahlenden Augen der Kinder erkennen, dass deine Worte und der Umstand, {mf|den Freihändler|die Freihändlerin} persönlich getroffen zu haben, einen tiefen Eindruck bei ihnen hinterlassen haben.{/n}

languages.text: {n}À voir leurs yeux brillants, vous savez que vos paroles et le simple fait d'avoir rencontré {mf|le libre-marchand|la libre-marchande} en personne leur laisseront une impression indélébile.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You can tell by their bright eyes that your words and the very fact of meeting the Rogue Trader in the flesh have left an indelible impression on them.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}À voir les yeux brillants des enfants, vous savez que vos paroles et le simple fait d'avoir rencontré {mf|le libre-marchand|la libre-marchande} en personne leur laisseront une impression indélébile.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Gençlerin gözleri ışıldıyor. Sözlerinin yanı sıra bizzat Hür Tacir ile tanışmanın, gençlerde kalıcı bir iz bıraktığı her hâllerinden belli oluyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You can tell by their bright eyes that your words and the very fact of meeting the Rogue Trader in the flesh have left an indelible impression on them.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Gençlerin gözleri ışıldıyor. Sözlerinin yanı sıra bizzat Hür Tacir ile tanışmanın, gençlerde kalıcı bir iz bıraktığı her hâllerinden aşikâr.{/n}
